Hello! My name is **Jaia Wingard**, and this website was created as part of my Data Science Course [P8105](https://p8105.com/index.html) for the Biostatistics Certificate. 

Here, you will find examples of my work in R, including data visualizations, interactive dashboards, and more.

Go to the [About](about.html) page to learn more about my academic and professional experience.

Go to the [Dashboard](dashboard.html) page to find examples of interactive data visualizations creared in R using `plotly` and `flexdashboard`.
